verbs.description: The Trump administration 's decision to [V: slap] [ARG1: tariffs on Canada and Mexico] makes it less likely there will be a new NAFTA deal in the near term and sends a modestly negative signal on U.S. trade policy , according to Goldman Sachs economists .

[ARG0: The Trump administration 's decision to slap tariffs on Canada and Mexico] [V: makes] [ARG1: it less likely there will be a new NAFTA deal in the near term] and sends a modestly negative signal on U.S. trade policy , [ARGM-ADV: according to Goldman Sachs economists] .

The Trump administration 's decision to slap tariffs on Canada and Mexico makes it less likely there [V: will] be a new NAFTA deal in the near term and sends a modestly negative signal on U.S. trade policy , according to Goldman Sachs economists .
